content.description: Start sitting on the right arete with a small left hand crimp and good right handhold.  Throw your right heel on and slap your right hand up to a decent sloper.  Move left hand up to a good sloping edge with a thumb catch, and then right hand up to another similar hold with a thumb catch.  Use intermediate crimps to slap your left hand up and out left to some jugs and top out.
content.location: Start on right arete of the Alcove Entrance Boulder and climb the face.  This is to the right of Cobble Poppin'.

content.description: The crux is getting from the sit start up to the better holds around mid height.  Just to the left of the tree, start sitting with your choice of the crimpers in front of your face.  It is easy once you get the sit start, fun problem.
content.location: This is to the left of the tree on the Alcove Entrance Boulder.

content.description: Sit start with your hands matched on a sloper on the right end of the boulder. Traverse left utilizing heel hooks and more slopers, eventually going up the arete of Trance Space.
content.location: In the corridor when facing the main alcove area, locate the low shelf on your left.

content.description: Sit start on crimps with a decent foothold down low.  Pull up to a cobble/crimp out right, and then up on smaller holds until you hit the jug and top out.
content.location: Sit start to the right of the tree/Stoned Highway and to the left of Trance Space.

content.description: This is the boulder on your left before you squeeze your boulder pad through the entrance to the Alcove.  The problems are harder and shorter but overall pretty fun.
